name: Retro First Friday Collection #2
description:
Ziggurat started Retro First Friday in 2020 as a way to bring retro games into the digital age for modern players to enjoy. This bundle includes many of the classic titles released during Retro First Friday in 2020.
Games included in this bundle:
  • Purple Saturn Day
  • The Legacy: Realm of Terror
  • Timequest
  • Return of the Phantom
  • Battle Engine Aquila
  • Altered Destiny
  • Psi 5 Trading Company
  • XF5700 Mantis Experimental Fighter
